text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
At long last, the witch had found her<n>way to the world
outside.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Everywhere she looked, she saw<n>sights she had never
seen before,<n>sights filled with wonder.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
If I could use my magic in this<n>beautiful world, how joyous it
would<n>be! Her heart leapt with excitement.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
She told the people of the world<n>outside, "I'll use my magic
to make<n>your wishes come true."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But when she began to cast a spell,<n>the people all ran away
from her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The people of the world outside saw<n>magic as a terrifying
force.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
They feared that magic might change<n>the way of the world,
the one they<n>knew so well.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
The witch said to them, "I want to use<n>my magic to make
everyone happy."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
To prove she meant it, she used<n>magic to fly up into the sky.
"See?<n>With this, you can go wherever you<n>like."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But the people only grew more afraid,<n>and began to shun
the witch.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Now she was all alone in the world<n>outside.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: "Why do I have these powers?" she<n>wondered once more.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Onstage for her winning concert<n>following the Kikuka Sho,
Rice<n>Shower's reception is less than<n>stellar.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The crowd greets her with harsh<n>stares and harsher words
for denying<n>Mihono Bourbon's Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: I came here to watch Mihono<n>Bourbon win!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: Man, I wanted to see Mihono<n>Bourbon at center stage.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Not a single voice can be heard<n>praising today's victor.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: What are they... But Rice won...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Screw it, Imma shut 'em up myself!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
No, you will not. Just leave it be.<n>Many were eager to see
Bourbon<n>achieve the Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: But c'mon...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I've a much better idea.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Rice! You ran spectacularly today!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As boos echo across the stadium,<n>McQueen sends a
wholehearted cheer<n>to the stage.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If no one else wants to sing Rice<n>Shower's praises, then
it's up to us<n>to do so, as her teammates.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If no one else wants to sing Rice<n>Shower's praises, then
it's up to us<n>to do so, as her teammates.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I let loose a cheer of my own, a<n>balloon floats up into the
air, with a<n>banner drooping down from it.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Hey, what's the deal with that?! It<n>says "Congrats on the
Triple Crown"!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Someone must've let go of it by<n>mistake. But the damage is
already<n>done.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Up on stage, Rice's voice shrinks to a<n>quivering whine. I've
never been to a<n>winning concert that felt so long.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Aw, don't look so sad! You finally got<n>your big win!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Aw, don't look so sad! You finally got<n>your big win!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
That's right! Let's have Trainer take<n>us to the amusement
park again!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yeah, the actual famous one thistime!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Thanks, guys.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But I'm kinda tired. I think I'll just go<n>home.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She walks out of the room, with her<n>head hanging low.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: ...Looks like it really got to her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Defeating the undefeated Mihono<n>Bourbon was a big
achievement—but<n>one that fans couldn't accept.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I knew there'd be some backlash,<n>but not this much.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
One can hardly blame her. To work so<n>hard, only to be
rewarded like that...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Nevertheless, she must find a way to<n>overcome this.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Such is the duty of a victor... of one<n>who runs with the hopes
of so many<n>on her shoulders.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The duty of one who runs with the<n>hopes of many on her
shoulders...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the moment, I'm not sure if I fully<n>understand what she
means.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A few days later...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huff... puff...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
A full second behind McQueen. Not in<n>the groove today
either, huh.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah... Sorry.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
McQueen hasn't made a full recovery<n>yet, but she's
starting to train again.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even with the advantage, though, Rice<n>is struggling to keep
up.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Meh, we could all do better.<n>McQueen's scrambling to rein
in her<n>cravings now that she's running<n>again.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Am not! Could you not make things<n>up?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
A third consecutive win in the Tenno<n>Sho is on the line for
me. I've much<n>training to make up for.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Rice, let's give it another go. In my<n>current state, you ought
to be able to<n>pass me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Okay, I'll try my best.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
They run a few more laps, but she's<n>never able to overtake
McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Later in the day...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Knock, knock

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer, if I may.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
McQueen pays a surprise late-night<n>visit to my office, her
face more stern<n>than usual.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, I've a favor to ask you with<n>regards to the Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her expression tells me this is going<n>to be serious. And with
dead silence<n>replacing the room's usual cheer, I<n>start to
feel almost nervous.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The spring Tenno Sho that my third<n>win depends on...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'd like you to let Rice race in it too.
